scripts.start: echo 'enter date range start yyyy-mm-dd (blank for oldest)' && read start_date && echo 'enter date range end yyyy-mm-dd (blank for most recent)' && read end_date && default_start_date="${start_date:-default_date}"; default_end_date="${end_date:-default_date}" && npm run parser $default_start_date $default_end_date
